<h2>NvChad example:</h2>

## CHANGELOG:

#### Added

- `rust-analyzer`
- `vim-surround`

#### Changed

- Keybinding for `tree`/"Side Menu" to `Ctrl-\` (or in vim terms called: '<C-\\>')
- Keybinding for `fzf` file finder to `Ctrl-p` ('<C-p>') more aligned towards VSCode Keybindings
